alert.note: Alert for Charles Mix; Gregory (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued March 14 at 8:06PM MDT until March 15 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT TUESDAY AFTERNOON AND EARLY EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR SOUTH CENTRAL SOUTH DAKOTA... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 050 AND 063... .Gusty southwest winds during the afternoon hours will couple with low relative humidity to create potentially critical fire weather conditions. The fire threat is somewhat lesser in areas with lingering snow cover east of a Geddes to Pickstown line. The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a Fire Weather Watch, which is in effect from Tuesday afternoon through Tuesday evening. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire weather zones 050 and 063. * WIND...Southwest to south-southwest 18 to 24 mph with gusts to around 30 mph. * HUMIDITY...As low as 17 to 20 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
